LanguageData.ZP_KaiShield.label: Kaitate
LanguageData.ZP_KaiShield.description: An installation type shield that can prevent shooting.\nIt is an inexpensive shield with a high coverage rate and made by a quick construction, but it needs to be careful as the durability burns considerably low.
LanguageData.ZP_KaiShield_Blueprint.label: Kaitate(blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_KaiShield_Frame.label: Kaitete(building)
LanguageData.ZP_KaiShield_Frame.description: An installation type shield that can prevent shooting.\nIt is an inexpensive shield with a high coverage rate and made by a quick construction, but it needs to be careful as the durability burns considerably low.
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump.label: Straw mass
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump.description: Flammable straw clumps. By arranging and burning, it is possible to create a wall of fire. Since it deals with fire, you must be careful in operation.
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Blueprint.label: Straw mass(blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Frame.label: Straw mass(building)
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Frame.description: Flammable straw clumps. By arranging and burning, it is possible to create a wall of fire. Since it deals with fire, you must be careful in operation.
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Gunpowder.label: Gunpowder in Straw mass
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Gunpowder.description: A mass of straw containing explosives. It can be exploded by burning. Since it deals with fire, you must be careful in operation.
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Gunpowder_Blueprint.label: Gunpowder in Straw mass(blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Gunpowder_Frame.label: Gunpowder in Straw mass(building)
LanguageData.ZP_StrawLump_Gunpowder_Frame.description: A mass of straw containing explosives. It can be exploded by burning. Since it deals with fire, you must be careful in operation.
